"https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/text", "svg.textPath" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/textPath", "svg.title" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/title", "svg.tref" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/tref", "svg.tspan" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/tspan", "svg.unknown" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/unknown", "svg.use" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/use", "svg.view" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/view", "svg.vkern" => "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/vkern" }
left_tag = ENV["TM_SCOPE_LEFT"][/meta\.tag\.\w+\.((svg\.|math\.)?[\w\-]+)\.\w+\.html/, 1].to_s right_tag = ENV["TM_SCOPE"][/meta\.tag\.\w+\.((svg\.|math\.)?[\w\-]+)\.\w+\.html/, 1].to_s
url = $tags[left_tag.downcase] || $tags[right_tag.downcase] || 'https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element'
puts "<meta http-equiv='Refresh' content='0;URL=#{url}'>"
